text: Donald Jeffrey Little is a former Major League Baseball pitcher. Little played in two seasons: for the St. Louis Cardinals and for the Minnesota Twins. He pitched in a total of 40 games, including 2 starts. ==References== ==External links== , or Retrosheet, or Pura Pelota Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Arkansas Travelers players Category:Baseball players from Ohio Category:Decatur Commodores players Category:Great Falls Giants players Category:Lafayette Drillers players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:Nashua Pirates players Category:Orlando Twins players Category:People from Fremont, Ohio Category:Phoenix Giants players Category:Springfield Redbirds players Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Tigres de Aragua players Category:Toledo Mud Hens players Category:Waterbury Giants players
